update PERSONAL_LOAN_CONTRACT_INFO
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BORROWER_NAME = #{borrowerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
